attributes.action: Stop the imposition of vat on increased charges from british telecom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having recently been charged an extra fifty pence per month for paying british telecom bills in a normally accepted manner, to now find the government earning more in revenue through the imposition of vat on these additional charges is now downright disgusting. We therefore call on the prime minister as head of our 
government to give heed to ceasing this vat charge.
